#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int cases;
    cin>>cases;
    while(cases--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int* wpies=new int[n];  //weight of pies
        int *wracks=new int[n];      //weight limits of racks
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>wpies[i];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>wracks[i];
        sort(wpies,wpies+n);
        sort(wracks,wracks+n);
        int count=0;
        for(int i=0,j=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(wracks[i]>=wpies[j])
            {
                count++;
                j++;
            }
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
 
    }
}
